text: The Nokia 4.2 is a Nokia-branded entry-level smartphone running the Android operating system released 14 May 2019. == Overview == It features 5.71" 19:9 720x1520p IPS LCD display, an octa-core Qualcomm Snapdragon 439 (12 nm) chipset, a dual-camera 13MP + 2MP setup on the back along with wide-angle 8 MP front camera. The camera of the Nokia 4.2 uses phase detection auto-focus. The Nokia 4.2 has a large screen and thin bezels with a dewdrop notch. The phone has a chin on the bottom with the Nokia logo. === RAM/Storage === The phone comes with two types of models: # 2GB RAM variant with 16 GB e-MMC 5.1 secondary memory. # 3GB RAM variant with 32 GB e-MMC 5.1 secondary memory. They both support up to 400 GB external memory card. === Sensors and inputs === It has Micro USB (USB 2.0) port, Ambient light sensor, Proximity sensor, Accelerometer and rear-mounted fingerprint sensor. https://www.gsmarena.com/nokia_4_2-9603.php https://www.gizmochina.com/product/nokia-4-2/ == Reception == The Nokia 4.2 won a Good Design Award 2019 == References == == External links == * Official Nokia 4.2 website Category:Nokia mobile phones Category:Mobile phones introduced in 2019 Category:Phones with multiple rear cameras
title: Nokia 4.2
